hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Install dependencies sudo zypper update -y cat /etc/issue
sudo zypper install --force-resolution -y python=2.7.9 sudo zypper install -y gcc gcc-c++ make flex bison gperf ruby openssl-devel freetype-devel fontconfig-devel libicu-devel sqlite-devel libpng-devel libjpeg-devel python-setuptools git xorg-x11-devel xorg-x11-essentials xorg-x11-fonts xorg-x11 xorg-x11-util-devel libXfont-devel libXfont1 python-pytz python --version export phantomjs_home=`pwd`
#Install python module sudo easy_install argparse
#Get PhanomJS Code git clone git://github.com/ariya/phantomjs.git cd phantomjs git checkout 2.1.1
#Compile and link python build.py
#Run the test-suite cd $phantomjs_home cd phantomjs/test python run-tests.py 2>&1 | tee testlogs && tail -4 testlogs > generated_failures
echo " 203 passed 4 passed unexpectedly 12 failed as expected 2 skipped" > expected_failures
diff -u --ignore-all-space generated_failures expected_failures
#Check the version cd $phantomjs_home cd phantomjs bin/phantomjs --version
bin/phantomjs --version >> output.txt
echo '2.1.1' > expected.txt result=`diff output.txt expected.txt`
if [ -z "$result" ] ; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
